Item ID1550

Garlic is an item used in several quests. Although it cannot be eaten on its own, it is used in Cooking in making Spicy sauce and in Herblore in making Guthix balance potions.

Contents

  • 1 Use in quests
  • 2 Products
  • 3 Obtaining
  • 4 Item sources
    • 4.1 Spawns
    • 4.2 Shop locations

Use in quests[edit | edit source]

  • Garlic is used along with a stake and a hammer to kill Count Draynor, a level 34 vampyre, at the end of the Vampyre Slayer quest.
  • Players must use garlic to drive the Sinister Stranger away from the best Fishing spot during Fishing Contest.
  • Players may grind garlic into garlic powder with a pestle and mortar, which is used during the Desert Treasure quest.

Obtaining[edit | edit source]

Garlic can be found at these locations:

  • Respawns on a table in a house in Seers' Village.
  • Bought from the Spice seller in East Ardougne.
  • Respawns on the Red table of the cooking range house, near East Ardougne; located west side of Town square.
  • Found in the cupboard upstairs in Morgan's house, located in Draynor Village. (Look for quest icon on minimap)
  • Bought or thieved from Greengrocer vegetable stall in Etceteria and Miscellania.
  • Can be found in a Teak larder of a Player-owned house.
  • Can be found in a chest underneath the pub in Burgh de Rott.

[[File:Garlic detail.png|left|110px]]
'''Garlic''' is an item used in several quests. Although it cannot be eaten on its own, it is used in [[Cooking]] in making [[Spicy sauce]] and in [[Herblore]] in making [[Guthix balance potion]]s.
==Use in quests==
*Garlic is used along with a [[stake]] and a [[hammer]] to kill [[Count Draynor]], a level 34 [[vampyre]], at the end of the [[Vampyre Slayer]] quest.
*Players must use garlic to drive the [[Sinister Stranger]] away from the best [[Fishing]] spot during [[Fishing Contest]].
*Players may grind garlic into [[garlic powder]] with a [[pestle and mortar]], which is used during the [[Desert Treasure]] quest.
==Products==
{{Uses material list|Garlic}}
==Obtaining==
Garlic can be found at these locations:

*Respawns on a table in a house in [[Seers' Village]].
*Bought from the [[Spice seller]] in [[East Ardougne]].
*Respawns on the Red table of the cooking range house, near East [[Ardougne]]; located west side of Town square.
*Found in the cupboard upstairs in [[Morgan]]'s house, located in [[Draynor Village]]. (Look for quest icon on minimap)
*Bought or thieved from Greengrocer vegetable stall in [[Etceteria]] and [[Miscellania]].
*Can be found in a [[Teak larder]] of a [[Player-owned house]].
*Can be found in a chest underneath the pub in [[Burgh de Rott]].
